Container.Name: cross-seed-cleanup
Container.Overview: Identifies torrents that are only used for cross-seeding and not hardlinked into a media library (Sonarr/Radarr). Compares filesystem hardlink counts against qBittorrent torrent references to find reclaimable space.

Config.Name: /data
Config.Description: Path to your torrent data. Must match the paths qBittorrent uses.

Config.Name: QB_HOST
Config.Description: qBittorrent Web UI host (IP or hostname).

Config.Name: TAG_REMOVABLE
Config.Description: Tag applied to torrents that can be safely removed.

Config.Name: EXCLUDE_TAGS
Config.Description: Comma-separated tags to skip (torrents with these tags are never marked removable).

Config.Name: INCLUDE_CATEGORIES
Config.Description: Comma-separated categories to check. If empty, all categories are checked.

Config.Name: MIN_AGE_DAYS
Config.Description: Only tag torrents older than this many days. 0 to disable.

Config.Name: SCHEDULE
Config.Description: Cron expression for scheduled runs (e.g. '0 */6 * * *' for every 6 hours). If empty, runs once and exits.

Config.Name: RUN_ON_START
Config.Description: Run immediately on container start before entering the cron schedule. Only applies when SCHEDULE is set.

Config.Name: DRY_RUN
Config.Description: Set to false to actually apply tags. When true, only reports what would be tagged.
